data.text: @Witchaywoman Thanks Jackie. It's just so tragic. xxx
@CherylCritchley An important message Cheryl. Very much worth checking. Thinking of you 🥰🥰
@Rusty1808 Thanks and so glad you are OK now. It just rams home the importantance of heart health checks for anyone who might be at risk. I had the necessary checks and luckily I was OK.

@CherylCritchley Thinking of you Cheryl with the additional sad news this morning. Such an important message. I had open heart surgery just on a year ago and was extremely lucky not to get Covid whilst tending to two cases in my household.
